blog.name: niceness6of9gemini
blog.title: Hogwarts Mystery: The Cursed Crusaders
blog.description: Damon Isaac McCall Jr.•24 •Spiritual ॐ •Eclectic Witch🌒🌕🌘 •Nature 🌲🌻🍄🌻🌲 •Gemini Rising ♊👾♊️ •Virgo Moon ♍️🌕♍️ • Columbia, MD🌃 •Empath 🔮 •

summary:
Merula: So Rose, The Celestial Ball. You getting fancied up? You finally plan on snogging Haywood?
Isaac: Then why did you...
body:
Merula: So Rose, The Celestial Ball. You getting fancied up? You finally plan on snogging Haywood?

Isaac: Then why did you approach me at all?

Merula: I just thought that since how much of a loser you are that you wouldn’t show up. Or you would go but be embarrassed.

Merula (whispering): It’s not like I wanted to go to the Ball with you or anything.

Isaac: What did you say, Merula?

Merula: Nothing, Rose. Shut up!

(Merula runs towards Ismelda)

Ben: Is it me or does Merula seem more nervous that I am?

Isaac: What did you say, Merula?

Merula: Nothing, Rose. Shut up!

(Merula runs towards Ismelda)

Ben: Is it me or does Merula seem more nervous that I am?

summary: 6 and 19 for the MC ask for both your Mcs :D
question: 6 and 19 for the MC ask for both your Mcs :D
answer:
6. Favorite professor?

19. What do they smell when brewing Amortentia?

For Samuel :

  • Beer
  • Wet grass
  • Old books

For Anna :

  • Beer
  • Warm bread
  • Coffee

Thanks for your ask 💕

title: Date
body:
Ya’ll, we have two options, right? Penny or Barnaby?

Are there any requirements (like a certain level of courage/sympathy/knowledge/friendship) to ask someone out? Or we get to do that “for free”?

summary:
REQUEST LINK

 greetings everyone!
 i’m joanna and i’m looking for players interested in being a part of the flying broomstick...
caption:
REQUEST LINK

greetings everyone!

i’m joanna and i’m looking for players interested in being a part of the flying broomstick tavern family! <3 most of characters for this request are all very open and vague, so you can pretty much do anything you want with them! two characters have slightly more detailed plotlines, though i’m open to discussion!

the tavern:

from the outside it does not seem like much. just a tiny house that probably could use some maintanance. go inside though and you find yourself in a labirynth leading to several differently themed rooms. each of these has it’s own room manager and bar staff. some of the rooms you might find: karaoke, dueling, open mic night, nightclub… but who’s to say there aren’t more? each time you come into this establishment the labyrinth changes and you might not even find the room you’re looking for!

link to word-building thread: here.

owner: 

this person is a character that is 55+ and they can be an npc! their family owns the flying broomstick and it has been in their family since it’s establishment back when the settlement was first formed. they are getting ready to retire and give the running of the business completely over to their child. at the moment they’re still around and essentially training their child even more when it comes to taking care of the tavern and it’s rich history. they’ve always been a good and understanding boss, and while demanding hard-work and dedication from their employees, they’ve always been there for the employees if something was upsetting them. very often they’ve given ‘the outcasts’ a chance to make something of themselves. émelie was such a character and the two are very close. while they trust their child to take care of the tavern, they’re also afraid of the changes that could happen.

head manager/almost owner: 

this is the child of the owner. whether they are the only, oldest, middle, youngest child, it’s up to you. they should be in their 30s though. whether they really want to become the new owner or if that’s just how their life cards were dealt, that’s up to you. but they might have differng ideas as to what they see for the future of the tavern and perhaps it’s not really what the parent had envisionned. they don’t really like émelie because she’s not exactly the best people person. but they’ve known each other for a decade. the manager/almost owner tolerates her as an employee though especially since their parent is fond of her and the parent wrote in a clause stating that if they were to fire émelie without proper cause (endangering the workplace or stealing), they would lose the tavern. so that’s something that pisses the manager off though.

other characters:

bartenders, room managers, musicians, security, cooking staff, cleaning staff, other positions you might think of

summary: I just discovered that in China, there are fake Harry Potter novels. With such classic novels as:  Harry Potter And Leopard Walk...
body:
I just discovered that in China, there are fake Harry Potter novels. With such classic novels as: 

Harry Potter And Leopard Walk Up To Dragon 

Harry Potter And The Filler Of Big

Harry Potter And The Dream Of Cities

Harry Potter And The Spirit Lake


Source

blog.name: blogofstuff-i-like
blog.title: basically a starkid blog at this point

summary: So my friend started to watch avpm for the first time
body:
So my friend started to watch avpm for the first time

He was texting me through out the experience:

“What the fuck were they all on!? And where can I get it!?”

“ Holy shit the fucking SCARF OF SEXUAL PREFERENCE!!!!!!!!!?”

“WHaT tHE FUck Is SnAPE DOING WITH HIS FUCKIN FACEEEEEEEEEE!?!?!?!??”

“What the actual fuck am I watching?”

“Lemme just say… Draco is so fuckin into potter”

“WHAT THE FUCK IS SHE DOING!!!!!!! DRACOS ROLLING AROUND ON THE GROUND DOING TITANIC POSES AND BEING FUCKIN AMAZING!!!!!”

“He’s a lion… who talks”

“ “Hey no fair! My legs are jelly” has to be the best fucking thing ever”

“This actually can’t be happening” (in this sentence, he’s talking about part 5 aka the first qurriel and Voldemort scene)

“ “I’m bleeding! Look at this!” ”

“I just saw the giant chocolate bar and I’ve had enough for the night.”

I think he’s enjoying it

“This actually can’t be happening” (in this sentence, he’s talking about part 5 aka the first qurriel and Voldemort scene)

“ “I’m bleeding! Look at this!” ”

“I just saw the giant chocolate bar and I’ve had enough for the night.”

I think he’s enjoying it
trail.content:
So my friend started to watch avpm for the first time

He was texting me through out the experience:

“What the fuck were they all on!? And where can I get it!?”

“ Holy shit the fucking SCARF OF SEXUAL PREFERENCE!!!!!!!!!?”

“WHaT tHE FUck Is SnAPE DOING WITH HIS FUCKIN FACEEEEEEEEEE!?!?!?!??”

“What the actual fuck am I watching?”

“Lemme just say… Draco is so fuckin into potter”

“WHAT THE FUCK IS SHE DOING!!!!!!! DRACOS ROLLING AROUND ON THE GROUND DOING TITANIC POSES AND BEING FUCKIN AMAZING!!!!!”

“He’s a lion… who talks”

“ “Hey no fair! My legs are jelly” has to be the best fucking thing ever”

“This actually can’t be happening” (in this sentence, he’s talking about part 5 aka the first qurriel and Voldemort scene)

“ “I’m bleeding! Look at this!” ”

“I just saw the giant chocolate bar and I’ve had enough for the night.”

I think he’s enjoying it

blog.name: mymindsmadness
blog.title: My Mind's Madness
blog.description: 29 (until further notice) ⇾ Female ⇾ Pan but happily (monogamously) married ⇾ RL Pansy Parkinson. Don't @ Me.

summary: Okay, but imagine that every time Draco gets angry at Harry, he calls him ‘Potter’ and eventually, their daughter picks up on...
body:
Okay, but imagine that every time Draco gets angry at Harry, he calls him ‘Potter’ and eventually, their daughter picks up on the habit and when she doesn’t get her way, she just copies Draco.

Harry: No Lily, you can’t have another sweet.

Lily: You said I could, Potter!

Harry: *groaning* We’ve been over this, Lils, you cannot call me that!

Draco: *smug and proud* Lighten up, Potter.

Lily: Yeah, Potter!

Harry: *glaring at Draco* I’ll deal with you later…

summary: Want to know a secret about me? I am addicted to Drarry. The true secret though... is me not being ashamed. People can know how...
body: Want to know a secret about me? I am addicted to Drarry. The true secret though… is me not being ashamed. People can know how cute my babies are! Not my bad they can’t see it.

Pixie Poker Productions, a cosplay group from Denmark.
Don't feel shy about writing to us; ask whatever questions you may have, and feel free to follow up on what we're doing! Updates, as well as our videos and pictures can be found here.

summary: Preparing for our next videos The last few days, Anna has been working on making decorations for the sets of the Gryffindor...
caption:
Preparing for our next videos
The last few days, Anna has been working on making decorations for the sets of the Gryffindor dorm, which will feature in the next videos that we will be filming!

We figured we’d share a couple of pictures of the finished decorations with you :)

summary: The weekend is coming, and I thought I’d have a little fun with fan art. So here’s a simple Draco for you. I’m not a Slytherin...
caption:
The weekend is coming, and I thought I’d have a little fun with fan art. So here’s a simple Draco for you. I’m not a Slytherin (Ravenclaw here) but I have a great appreciation for this House. I know a lot of people cringe at the mention of Slytherin, but I do truly believe that there’s something endearing and special about the people who belong in this House. 

What about you? What House are you in?

Anyway, have an excellent weekend ahead :)
